original_solution_mapping.L3: In three years, Sue will be 3 + 3 = <<3+3=6>>6.
original_solution_mapping.L4: In three years, Same will be 6 + 3 = <<6+3=9>>9.
original_solution_mapping.L5: In three years, Kendra will be 18 + 3 = <<18+3=21>>21.
original_solution_mapping.L6: Their total age in three years is 6 + 9 + 21 = <<6+9+21=36>>36.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6384.
    Returns: the total age of Sam, Sue, and Kendra in three years.
    """
    # L1
    kendra_current_age = 18 # Kendra is currently 18
    kendra_sam_multiplier = 3 # Kendra is 3 times as old as Sam
    sam_current_age = kendra_current_age / kendra_sam_multiplier

    # L2
    sam_sue_multiplier = 2 # Sam is twice as old as Sue
    sue_current_age = sam_current_age / sam_sue_multiplier

    # L3
    years_in_future = 3 # in 3 years
    sue_age_in_3_years = sue_current_age + years_in_future

    # L4
    sam_age_in_3_years = sam_current_age + years_in_future

    # L5
    kendra_age_in_3_years = kendra_current_age + years_in_future

    # L6
    total_age_in_3_years = sue_age_in_3_years + sam_age_in_3_years + kendra_age_in_3_years

    # FA
    answer = total_age_in_3_years
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: In three years, Sue will be {sue_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{sue_current_age}+{years_in_future}={sue_age_in_3_years}>>{sue_age_in_3_years}.
In three years, Same will be {sam_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{sam_current_age}+{years_in_future}={sam_age_in_3_years}>>{sam_age_in_3_years}.
In three years, Kendra will be {kendra_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{kendra_current_age}+{years_in_future}={kendra_age_in_3_years}>>{kendra_age_in_3_years}.

Their total age in three years is {sue_age_in_3_years} + {sam_age_in_3_years} + {kendra_age_in_3_years} = <<{sue_age_in_3_years}+{sam_age_in_3_years}+{kendra_age_in_3_years}={total_age_in_3_years}>>{total_age_in_3_years}.
